name: Welcome To Mooseport Online Quiz | W | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Donald Petrie.

	Petrie directed, Hackman and Savage were actors and Schulman wrote the script.

questions.text: Which of the following movies did Donald Petrie direct?
questions.correct: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
options: He has never directed a movie before
both How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days & 50 First Dates
questions.explanation:
How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days.

	This movie was rated PG-13 for brief nudity and adult content. Petrie has directed movies dating all the way back to 1988 with "Mystic Pizza".

questions.text: What was the name of Gene Hackman's character?
questions.explanation:
Monroe Cole & Cole.

	Hackman has also been in movies such as, "The Replacemants", "Behind Enemy Lines", and "Runaway Jury".

questions.text: What job did Ray Romano's character have?
questions.explanation:
Plumber.

	He was a plumber, but he ran for mayor. I won't ruin it for you about whethor he wins or not.

questions.text: Editor Debra Neil-Fisher also had a part in the movie
questions.explanation:
false.

	She did not have anything to do with the movie except for editing. She has also done the editing for 2 of the Austin Powers movies.

questions.text: This was the first movie that Ray Romano appeared in.
questions.explanation:
false.

	He also appeared in "Ice Age" and "Comedian".

questions.text: What did the townspeople want President Cole to do?
questions.explanation:
run for mayor.

	They all wanted him to run for mayor. Handy Harrison(Romano) wanted it to be a fair election so he ran against him.

Christine Baranski.

	Baranski played Cole, but the other three all had parts in the movie.

questions.text: Who played Bullard in the movie?
options: Bullard is not a character in this movie.
More than 1 person played Bullard in the movie
questions.explanation:
Fred Savage.

	Fred Savage also played in "The Wonder Years" his brother Ben played in "Boy Meets World".

questions.text: How many people were listed as a producer when the final credits rolled?
questions.explanation:
8.

	Tom Schulman, Marc Frydman,and Basil Iwanyk were listed as producers. Moritz Borman, David Coatsworth, Doug Richardson, Rory Rosegarten were listed as executive producers. David Holden was listed as an associate producer. Hope you liked this quiz, please play some of my other quizzes.
